reference.shortdesc: The shape element defines the shape of a linkable region in an image map.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The values for use in the shape element are defined by the HTML5 specification. The following values are supported as the content of the shape element:

dlentry.dd: Indicates that the linkable region is a circle
Indicates the linkable region is a rectangle that exactly covers the entire image
Indicates that the linkable region is a polygon
Indicates that the linkable region is a rectangle

section.p: If the shape element is left empty, a rectangular shape is assumed.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The shape element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the utilities domain module.
